医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
每天玩几个小时电子游戏可以改善心理健康研究人员调查了新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间电子游戏对日本心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Playing-video-games-for-a- Couple-of-hours-a-day-can-improve-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Playing-video-games-for-a- Couple-of-hours-a-day-can-improve-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=001bae72-332e-4594-8845-c691b55b7582 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 10:10:00 -0400 Playing video games for a couple of hours a day can improve mental health
机器学习模型能否准确预测自闭症谱系障碍？一种新颖的 ML 算法（名为“AutMedAI”）能够以最少的背景和医疗信息进行早期自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Can-a-machine-learning-model-accurately-predict-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Can-a-machine-learning-model-accurately-predict-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28392368-598e-40b9-9f3f-684406771edd Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:54:00 -0400 Can a machine learning model accurately predict autism spectrum disorder?
人工智能驱动的自适应深部脑刺激可改善帕金森氏症症状研究人员将自适应深部脑刺激 (aDBS) 系统与传统 DBS 系统治疗帕金森病的安全性和可行性进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/AI-driven-adaptive-deep-brain-stimulation-improves-Parkinsone28099s-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/AI-driven-adaptive-deep-brain-stimulation-improves-Parkinsone28099s-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=731cc12d-fbfb-4426-9305-22e5571fbf20 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:53:00 -0400 AI-driven adaptive deep brain stimulation improves Parkinson’s symptoms
创意艺术和手工艺促进英国成年人的福祉研究人员强调了创意艺术和手工艺对幸福和孤独的各个方面的积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Creative-arts-and-crafts-boost-wellbeing-in-UK-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Creative-arts-and-crafts-boost-wellbeing-in-UK-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1cda7e5-9344-4309-9815-38d46890a6a3 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:42:00 -0400 Creative arts and crafts boost wellbeing in UK adults
麦卢卡蜂蜜在乳腺癌模型中的潜在抗肿瘤作用研究人员在体外和体内临床前模型中评估了麦卢卡蜂蜜对人类乳腺癌细胞的抗肿瘤活性及其潜在分子机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Potential-antitumoral-effects-of-Manuka-honey-in-breast-cancer-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Potential-antitumoral-effects-of-Manuka-honey-in-breast-cancer-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f65af4f6-9f04-4b51-ac4f-e278a6c46926 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:34:00 -0400 Potential antitumoral effects of Manuka honey in breast cancer models
新工具可以彻底改变心血管风险管理：PRESS 评分已得到验证血小板高反应性与心血管事件风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-tool-could-revolutionize-cardioangio-risk-management-PRESS-score-validated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-tool-could-revolutionize-cardioangio-risk-management-PRESS-score-validated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69623860-fc73-4058-b5d6-4170c8b83135 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:19:00 -0400 New tool could revolutionize cardiovascular risk management: PRESS score validated
普通脂肪酸可以改善复发性细菌性阴道病感染的治疗研究人员研究了油酸作为抑制细菌性阴道病中惰性乳杆菌优势的潜在治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Common-fatty-acid-could-improve-treatment-of-recurrent-bacterial-vaginosis-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Common-fatty-acid-could-improve-treatment-of-recurrent-bacterial-vaginosis-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a612280-ab57-4308-b0f4-60b1b72f7546 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 09:04:00 -0400 Common fatty acid could improve treatment of recurrent bacterial vaginosis infections
加利福尼亚州球孢子菌病季节动态及其气候决定因素研究表明干旱条件抑制了球孢子菌病的季节性。然而，从干旱到潮湿的转变可能会导致加州出现更明显的季节性高峰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Coccidioidomycosis-seasonal-dynamics-and-their-climate-determinants-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Coccidioidomycosis-seasonal-dynamics-and-their-climate-determinants-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07d93ed4-4d51-454e-a60f-de1daf3beaa4 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 08:29:00 -0400 Coccidioidomycosis seasonal dynamics and their climate determinants in California

研究发现另外 31 种癌症可能与肥胖有关这项研究确定了 18 种潜在的与肥胖相关的癌症，揭示了与 BMI 的显着关联，并强调了肥胖对癌症风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Research-identizes-31-additional-cancers-pottially-linked-to-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Research-identizes-31-additional-cancers-pottially-linked-to-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e273dc9-d309-4317-88dc-53e0813df13b Thu, 22 Aug 2024 08:04:00 -0400 Research identifies 31 additional cancers potentially linked to obesity
